title: Update randomizedtesting to version 2.6.4
description:
https://github.com/randomizedtesting/randomizedtesting/releases/tag/release%2F2.6.4

A few minor bug fixes that showed up, junit4.tempDir is no longer required (set by the framework for the forked JVM).
